verbs.description: [ARG1: small plane] [V: rolls] [ARGM-DIR: off runway] [ARGM-DIR: onto montauk highway] the single - engine piper pa-28 crossed the two - lane road and hit a sign damaging the plane propeller and a wing before it came to rest in front of a commercial strip police said federal aviation administration east moriches long island republic airport delaware suffolk county police department lufker airport farmingdale nedie seidu n y ron delalio farmingdale new york manhattan
